task.name: hif_import_calstate
task.shortdescription: Import a calibration state from disk
task.description: hif_import calstate clears and then recreates the pipeline calibration state based on the set of applycal calls given in the named file.

param.name: filename
param.description: Name of the saved calibration state

task.example:
Import a calibration state to disk.
Keyword arguments:
filename -- Name of the saved calibration state.
Description
hif_import calstate clears and then recreates the pipeline calibration state based on the set of applycal calls given in the named file. The applycal statements are interpreted in additive fashion; for identically specified data selection targets, caltables specified in later statements will be added to the state created by earlier calls.
Issues
Example
1. Import a calibration state from disk.
hif_import_calstate(filename='aftergaincal.calstate')
